dump_options_info: Dump options are displayed in their respective menus for convenience.

overclock.label: Overclock
overclock.description:
Overclocks both CPU and MEM to 1785 MHz and 1600 MHz, respectively, in order to speed up dump operations. This is considered a relatively safe action.

If the application is running under title override mode, and sys-clk is active, and a clock profile has been created for the overridden title, this setting has no effect at all.

naming_convention.label: Naming convention
naming_convention.description:
Sets the naming convention used for all output dumps.

  Full: "{Name} [{Id}][v{Version}][{Type}]".
  ID and version only: "{Id}_v{Version}_{Type}".

If "Full" is selected, the display version string will also be appended to dumped updates whenever possible.

update_nswdb_xml.label: Update NSWDB XML
update_nswdb_xml.description: Retrieves the latest NSWDB XML, which can be optionally used to validate checksums from gamecard dumps. Requires Internet connectivity.

update_app.label: Update application
update_app.description: Checks if an update is available in nxdumptool's GitHub repository. Requires Internet connectivity.

notifications.no_internet_connection: Internet connection unavailable. Unable to update.
notifications.update_failed: Update failed! Check the logfile for more info.
notifications.is_nso: The application is running as an NSO. Unable to update.
notifications.already_updated: The application has already been updated. Please reload.
notifications.github_json_failed: Failed to download or parse GitHub release JSON!
notifications.up_to_date: The application is up to date!
notifications.app_updated: Application successfully updated! Please reload for the changes to take effect.
